content: The King of Glory Entering Zion.
The world, and those who dwell in it.
For He has founded it upon the seas
And established it upon the streams  the rivers.
Who may ascend onto the mountain of the ?
And who may stand in His holy place?
He who has clean hands and a pure heart,
Who has not lifted up his soul to what is false,
He shall receive a blessing from the ,
And righteousness from the God of his salvation.
This is the generation (description) of those who diligently seek Him  require Him as their greatest need,
Who seek Your face, even [as did] Jacob.
